original_text: They will greet you and offer you two loaves of bread, which you will accept from them.
korean_text: 그들이 네게 문안하고 떡 두 덩이를 주겠고 너는 그의 손에서 받으리라

sentences.original_text: and offer you two loaves of bread
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너에게 빵 두 덩어리를 제공할 것이다

sentences.original_text: which you will accept from them
